name: Roasted Asparagus and Apple Salad
author: bunchofms
summary: Interesting combination of ingredients makes for a tasty salad.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds thin asparagus, trimmed and cut into 4-inch pieces
1  apple - peeled, cored, and sliced thin
¼ pound shredded sharp white Cheddar cheese
directions: Preheat an oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Arrange asparagus pieces on a baking sheet
Drizzle 2 tablespoons olive oil over the asparagus; toss gently to coat and spread into a single layer
Roast asparagus in preheated oven until tender, about 25 minutes
Remove from oven and set aside to cool
Combine honey, white wine vinegar, 2 tablespoons olive oil, and garlic in a jar; seal tightly and shake vigorously to blend into a salad dressing
Arrange salad greens onto a large platter; top with apple slices, shredded white Cheddar cheese, and cooled asparagus
Drizzle the salad dressing over the salad greens and toppings
